ThingDef.label: Colt M1911
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.

ThingDef.label: SIG Sauer P226
ThingDef.description: The SIG Sauer P226 is a full-sized, service-type pistol made by SIG Sauer. The SIG Sauer P226 and its variants are in service with numerous law enforcement and military organizations worldwide. Low damage, high rate of fire and good accuracy.

ThingDef.label: Remington M95 Derringer
ThingDef.description: A small decorated revolver. Accurate at short range only, moderately damaging with a short aim- and cooldown period.

ThingDef.label: Sphinx AT 2000
ThingDef.description: A high quality and highly durable handgun, used by elite forces and sports shooters. Great accuracy, moderate damage and a tad slow.

ThingDef.label: Beretta 93R
ThingDef.description: A nice-looking machinepistol with a very fast burstfire mode, low stopping power and hits up to pistol range.

ThingDef.label: Vektor CP1
ThingDef.description: An ergonomical handgun with a drastically non-rectangular design. Good accuracy and low recoil, but weak and with a slightly lower range.

ThingDef.label: Para Ordnance P14-45
ThingDef.description: A counterfeit ancient 45 ACP handgun with slightly improved internal mechanisms and plastic frame. High accuracy and above average range, average fire rate and damage.

ThingDef.label: Desert Eagle .45 ACP
ThingDef.description: The legendary desert eagle .50 ACP. Marines favorite toy.

ThingDef.label: .44 Remington Magnum
ThingDef.description: The .44 Magnum is based on a lengthened .44 Special case, loaded to higher pressures for greater velocity (and thus, energy).

ThingDef.label: M37A2 Pumpshotgun
ThingDef.description: The M37A2 Pump Shotgun, also known as the M37A2 Combat Shotgun, is a pump-action combat shotgun manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems. The M37A2 is a simple and effective pump-action shotgun; its "classic" pump-action allows extremely powerful shells to be fired reliably. The M37A2 is employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps and Weyland-Yutani PMCs.

ThingDef.label: Remington 870
ThingDef.description: Ancient design. Deadly, but short range.

ThingDef.label: Striker shotgun
ThingDef.description: A cheap-looking semi-automatic shotgun. Has a higher fire rate and high damage output, but low range.

ThingDef.label: M45 Tactical Shotgun
ThingDef.description: The M45 Tactical Shotgun is a shotgun used by the United Nations Space Command Army.

ThingDef.label: Atchisson Assault AA-12
ThingDef.description: An automatic shotgun with almost no recoil. Burstfires, moderately accurate just under rifle range, and has high damage output.

ThingDef.label: M90 CAWS
ThingDef.description: The M90 Close Assault Weapon System (M90 CAWS) is the UNSC's primary shotgun and is one of the most effective close range infantry weapons used by front line forces.

ThingDef.label: TEC-9
ThingDef.description: A lightweight semi-automatic pistol with a quick draw, low damage and very high firerate. Operates at a short range.

ThingDef.label: M3 Greasegun
ThingDef.description: A very simplistic submachinegun design for todays standards. Low damage, high firerate, short range.

ThingDef.label: Uzi
ThingDef.description: A personal defense weapon is a micro-submachine gun. Short range, low power, high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.

ThingDef.label: Silenced TMP
ThingDef.description: A big machinepistol or small submachinegun. Somewhat accurate long range, fast burstfire with low stopping power.

ThingDef.label: Scorpion EVO 3
ThingDef.description: A machinepistol or light SMG with a notorious folding stock design. Fires weak ammunition in quick five shot-bursts at pistol range.

ThingDef.label: Kriss Vector K10
ThingDef.description: A submachinegun that fires in medium length bursts. Its substantially reduced knockback causes it to be accurate up to medium range, but its bullet drop limits maximal range by a lot.

ThingDef.label: HK MP5A3
ThingDef.description: The Heckler Koch MP5 is a 9mm submachine gun of German design, developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler Koch GmbH of Oberndorf am Neckar. Low damage and short range, very high rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: HK UMP45
ThingDef.description: The UMP45 is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler Koch. The UMP45 has been adopted by various agencies such as the U.S. Customs and Border Protection. Heckler Koch developed the UMP45 as a successor to the MP5. Average damage, low range and high rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: Spectre M4 Luger
ThingDef.description: A compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. Very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.

ThingDef.label: Lee-Enfield
ThingDef.description: Ancient bolt-action rifle. Good range, Good power, low rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: Mosin-Nagant M91
ThingDef.description: Ancient bolt-action rifle. Probably pulled from a basement somewhere. Good range, Good power, low rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: AKS-74U
ThingDef.description: The AKS-74U short assault rifle (the "U" suffix means"Ukorochennyj" in Russian = "Shortened" in English) has been developed in the late 1970s from the AKS-74 assault rifle. The AKS-74U was intended as a personal defense weapon for tank, gun, helicopter and other vehicle crews,and for the special operations forces. The AKS-74U has the size and effective range of a typical submachine gun, but has advantage of the assault rifle ammunition and magazines. Average damage and rate of fire, low range, poor accurracy.

ThingDef.label: Beretta CX4
ThingDef.description: A highly reliable, compact pistol calibre carbine designed to fire pistol rounds up to rifle range. Below average damage, average fire rate, above average range and fires in two round burst.

ThingDef.label: Ruger PC-9
ThingDef.description: A pistol calibre carbine sidearm carried on the back. Its long barrel allows it to fire pistol bullets at rifle range. Average damage, above average fire rate and range.

ThingDef.label: HK USC
ThingDef.description: A stable semi-automatic pistol calibre carbine with low kickback and an unusual stock design. Average damage, above average fire rate and range, fires three round bursts.

ThingDef.label: M4A1 Carbine
ThingDef.description: The M4 Carbine is a shorter and lighter variant of the M16A2 assault rifle, is heavily used by the United States Armed Forces and is replacing the M16 rifle in most United States Army and United States Marine Corps combat units as the primary infantry weapon. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.

ThingDef.label: M16 Rifle
ThingDef.description: A general-purpose military weapon for field or urban combat. It fires a three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: HK XM8 Military Rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern military weapon. Three-round burst. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: FAMAS G2
ThingDef.description: The FAMAS is a bullpup-styled assault rifle designed and manufactured in France by MAS located in Saint-Étienne, which is now a member of the French government-owned Nexter group. It is the service rifle of the French military. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.

ThingDef.label: AK-47
ThingDef.description: The AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62×39mm assault rifle, first developed in the Soviet Union by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is officially known as Avtomat Kalashnikova (Russian: Автомат Калашникова). Good damage, average range and rate of fire, poor accuracy.

ThingDef.label: Tavor TAR-21
ThingDef.description: The Marine sturm rifle is the standard firearm for all combat personnel in the Colonial Marine Corps.

ThingDef.label: MA5 ICWS
ThingDef.description: The MA5 Individual Combat Weapon System (MA5 ICWS or MA5 Assault rifle) is a standard-issue service rifle of the UNSC Marines.

ThingDef.label: SIG SG553
ThingDef.description: The SG553, a slightly improved version of the SG552, is the SBR (Short Barrel Rifle) version of the SIG SG550. It fires the 5.56x45mm NATO round. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.

ThingDef.label: Steyr AUG A3
ThingDef.description: The Steyr AUG is an Austrian bullpup 5.56×45mm NATO assault rifle, designed in the 1960s by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH. Average damage, good range and accuracy, low rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: FN SCAR-H
ThingDef.description: The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle (SCAR) is a gas-operated self-loading rifle with a rotating bolt. The rifle was developed by FN Herstal (FNH) for the United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM) to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. Good damage, good range and accuracy, low rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: M24 Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern military sniper rifle. Bolt action. Long range, great accuracy and power.

ThingDef.label: SVU OTs-03 Dragunov
ThingDef.description: The OTs-03 SVU is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. High damage, long range and very good accuracy.

ThingDef.label: VSS Thread Cutter
ThingDef.description: Special forces sniper rifle VSS Vintorez.

ThingDef.label: M42A Scope Rifle
ThingDef.description: The M42A Scope Rifle is an American-made semi-automatic sniper rifle chambered for 10mm M252 HEAP ammunition. It is employed as the primary sniper weapon of the United States Colonial Marine Corps.

ThingDef.label: Walther WA 2000 Rifle
ThingDef.description: Limited edition olden days sniper rifle. Great range, exceptional accuracy, very high damage and very low fire rate.

ThingDef.label: Armalite AR-50
ThingDef.description: A heavy and accurate, military-grade bolt-action rifle chambered for .50 calibre bullets. Its weight and muzzle brake significantly lower recoil. Average firerate, very high damage, accuracy and range.

ThingDef.label: Micor Defense MD50
ThingDef.description: An autoloading anti-materiel rifle with a compact bullpup design allowing it to be operated and carried by a single person. Used to destroy walls. Low fire rate, high range, extremely high damage and accuracy.

ThingDef.label: Ultima Ratio Hecate II
ThingDef.description: A special application scoped rifle with a long muzzle break and wooden stock. Packs and ton both in battle and when carried, greatly slowing any wielders pace. Used to destroy walls. Low fire rate, high range, very high damage and accuracy.

ThingDef.label: PTRD-41 Rifle
ThingDef.description: Anti tank rifle, with special armor piercing penetration rounds.

ThingDef.label: SRS99 AM Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: The sniper rifle system Anti-Materiel, more formally known as the Special Applications Rifle, Caliber 14.5 mm, SRS99, is a United Nations Space Command sniper rifle.

ThingDef.label: Barrett M82A1 SASR
ThingDef.description: The M82 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. It is used by many units and armies around the world. Despite its designation as an anti-materiel rifle, it is used by some armed forces as an anti-personnel sniper rifle. Very high damage, long range and very good accuracy.

ThingDef.label: RPK-74
ThingDef.description: Ancient pattern military weapon. Good range, low power, high rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: L-15 LMG
ThingDef.description: A light machine gun.

ThingDef.label: MA39X ICWS
ThingDef.description: The MA39X Individual Combat Weapon System (MA39X ICWS or MA39X Assault rifle) is a close combat service rifle of the UNSC.

ThingDef.label: M249 LMG SAW MG
ThingDef.description: M249 hand machinegun.

ThingDef.label: XM214 Microgun
ThingDef.description: A multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire. Mechanoid-built.

ThingDef.label: M56 Smart Gun
ThingDef.description: The M56 Smartgun is a man-portable heavy machine gun with automatic targeting capabilities chambered for heavy ammunition. It is notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps. It hurts like hell.

ThingDef.label: RL T9 Burning Sun
ThingDef.description: Incendiary bolt launcher. Starts fires.

ThingDef.label: Milkor MGL
ThingDef.description: A launcher type weapon that fires 40mm concussive grenades at a higher rate than a human could.

ThingDef.label: RPG-7
ThingDef.description: RPG Launcher.

ThingDef.label: M5 RPG
ThingDef.description: The M5 Rocket Propelled Grenade (RPG) is a portable, shoulder-fired, reloadable, semi-automatic unguided anti-armor rocket-propelled grenade launcher used by United States Colonial Marine Corps as their standard issue RPG. Able to load up to 4 rockets, the M5 RPG is the favorite anti-infantry toy of the USCM.

ThingDef.label: M72 LAW
ThingDef.description: Anti tank rocket launcher, with special armor piercing penetration rocket.

ThingDef.label: R3 Doomsday Rocket Launcher
ThingDef.description: A skynets doomsday rocket launcher.

ThingDef.label: R3 Blast-Rocket Launcher
ThingDef.description: A single-use rocket launcher that fires 3 projectiles in quick succession.

ThingDef.label: R2 Charge Blaster
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot energy/projectile rifle.

ThingDef.label: One-beam Laser Pulser
ThingDef.description: Fantastic Nanotech laser pulser.

ThingDef.label: Tri-beam Laser Pulser
ThingDef.description: Fantastic Nanotech heavy laser pulser.

ThingDef.label: Penta-beam Laser Pulser
ThingDef.description: Nanotech burst laser pulser.

ThingDef.label: C2 Precision Plasma Blaster
ThingDef.description: A plasma sniper rifle, highly accurate but with a low rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: C3 Plasma Blaster
ThingDef.description: A short range, lightweight plasma rifle.

ThingDef.label: C7 Multi-Plasma Blaster
ThingDef.description: A plasma rifle with good stopping power and range.

ThingDef.label: Extraterrestrial Railgun
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot rail-assisted lance weapon. Fires a single charged shot at high velocity.

ThingDef.label: X-Zero Railgun
ThingDef.description: An electrically charged electromagnetic projectile launcher.

ThingDef.label: Mech. Light Blaster
ThingDef.description: Mechanoid light blaster.

ThingDef.label: Mech. Heavy Charge Blaster
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot blaster for area suppressive fire. Mechanoid-built.

ThingDef.label: Mech. Inferno Cannon
ThingDef.description: Incendiary-shot mini-artillery device. Mechanoid-built.

ThingDef.label: Mech. Laser Pulser
ThingDef.description: A mechanoid laser pulser.

ThingDef.label: Mech. Heavy Laser Pulser
ThingDef.description: Mechanoid heavy laser pulser.

ThingDef.label: Mech. Plasma Heavy Blaster
ThingDef.description: Mechanoid plasma gun.

ThingDef.label: Mech. Plasma Blaster
ThingDef.description: Mechanoid plasma gun.

ThingDef.label: Fire Extinguisher
ThingDef.description: A gun loaded with expanding foam, used to extinguish fires.
